name: Boldly DASH!
description:
Boldly DASH! is a retro-inspired space shooter where dashing is just as important as shooting. Click to dash through enemies, dealing massive damage and filling up your ammo and NUKE-o-meter. When your health gets low, back up and shoot to regain health. When the time is right, right click to nuke 'em!

Cass McPhee is not a programmer - this is his first ever game! A huge thank you to Ben (http://www.heartbeast.co/) whose YouTube and Udemy game courses were integral to my learning process and were absolutely necessary references to get this game done for the GMTK Game Jam.
